snippet: The snow was no inconvenience to the children (and adults) who took to the slopes in Central Park on Monday.
abstract: Snow that has fallen unrelentingly on New York City this winter is source of fun and joy for many in Central Park, as they gleefully speed on their sleds down their favorite slopes.
lead_paragraph: The snow was no inconvenience to the children (and adults) who took to the slopes in Central Park on Monday.

headline.main: A Curse to Many in New York Is a Thrill for the More Daring
headline.print_headline: A Curse to Many in New York Is a Thrill for the More Daring
